name: 3DMark 2000
description:
* License: Legacy,
* Hardware acceleration benchmark software,
* Legacy key: 6VZTY-SDZ75-KA9V7,
* Legacy user: Futuremark,
* MP3codec DirectShow,
* DirectX: 7.
content:
files:
- setup: https://benchmarks.ul.com/downloads/3dmark2000.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/MadOnion.com/3DMark2000/3DMark2000.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: l3codecx
    arch: win64
    description: MP3codec DirectShow ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win98
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 98 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: setup
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/3dmark2000.exe
- task:
    description: 3DMark 2000 ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/3dmark2000.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register ExePath ...
    key: ExePath
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\MadOnion.com\3DMark2000
    type: REG_SZ
    value: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\MadOnion.com\\3DMark2000\\3DMark2000.exe
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register KeyCode ...
    key: 3DMarkRegKey
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\MadOnion.com\Registration2000
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 6VZTY-SDZ75-KA9V7
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Register KeyCode ...
    key: 3DMarkRegName
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\MadOnion.com\Registration2000
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Futuremark
system:
  disable_compositor: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
